entry.title: electric buzz generator
entry.content: simple square wave generator, to imitate electrical line buzzing between 40 and 60 hz. made to add a background sound layer to a sculpture project.
entry.summary: simple square wave generator, to imitate electrical line buzzing between 40 and 60 hz. made to add a background sound layer to a sculpture project.

entry.title: mala muerte
entry.content: installing my work una máquina que sólo puede girar at the torrance art museum for the upcoming exhibition mala muerte/bad death, part of sur biennial 2023.
entry.summary: installing my work una máquina que sólo puede girar at the torrance art museum for the upcoming exhibition mala muerte/bad death, part of sur biennial 2023.

entry.title: mirror archive
entry.content:
for the past year, i’ve been working on the mirror archive, an online site of documentation of the first decades of artists who create work with software and for the internet.

the archive is now live and can be explored and searched.

the project was lead by ucla dma faculty chandler mcwilliams, lauren lee mccarthy, and casey reas.
entry.summary: for the past year, i’ve been working on the mirror archive, an online site of documentation of the first decades of artists who create work with software and for the internet.

entry.title: emf listeners
entry.content: electromagnetic field listener kits for the students at a workshop taught for ucla art sci’s summer institute.
entry.summary: electromagnetic field listener kits for the students at a workshop taught for ucla art sci’s summer institute.

entry.title: helldesk
entry.content:
vr project with wiley wiggins for ucla dma 252c virtuality.

video and more images on wiley’s website.
entry.summary: vr project with wiley wiggins for ucla dma 252c virtuality.

entry.title: ucla game lab workshop
entry.content:
i led a workshop on custom game controllers in the ucla game lab. we went through the process of turning broken or old computer keyboards and mice into functioning prototypes for custom controllers, as a way to create fast and inexpensive experiments that move away from standard forms of interaction.

more info here.
entry.summary: i led a workshop on custom game controllers in the ucla game lab. we went through the process of turning broken or old computer keyboards and mice into functioning prototypes for custom controllers, as a way to create fast and inexpensive experiments that move away from standard forms of interaction.

entry.title: cartier retail innovation lab
entry.content: software development with greg sadetsky for an interactive kiosk present in five cartier retail locations.
entry.summary: software development with greg sadetsky for an interactive kiosk present in five cartier retail locations.

entry.title: sol de noche - irrupciones de video

link.title: sol de noche - irrupciones de video

entry.content:
junto con julieta caputo inauguramos sol de noche, una exihibición de imagen en movimiento en la ciudad de bariloche, emplazada en las pantallas publicitarias de la ciudad.

diez piezas de video de artistas patagóniques, seleccionadas a través de una convocatoria abierta, irrumpen la pauta publicitaria.

más información en el sitio web de la convocatoria.
entry.summary: junto con julieta caputo inauguramos sol de noche, una exihibición de imagen en movimiento en la ciudad de bariloche, emplazada en las pantallas publicitarias de la ciudad.
